description: Welcome to the first of a series of advanced rope tutorials. We have done basic tutorials in the past and wanted to give the membership a little advanced knowledge. I'm sure I've read somewhere lately that people wanted to see more rope tutorials. Lew Rubens is here to show us the basic and not-so-basic rope suspension ties. As with any information use caution and practice safe play. This is the first of four lessons.
title: Lew Rubens and Livia Choice
